name: blazer
description: Getting BMP image fast as possible

scripts.asbuild:debug: asc assembly/index.ts --initialMemory 256  --runtime minimal  --maximumMemory unlimited --enable simd --enable relaxed-simd -Ospeed --optimizeLevel 3  --target debug
scripts.asbuild:release: asc assembly/index.ts --initialMemory 256  --runtime minimal --maximumMemory unlimited --enable simd --enable relaxed-simd  -Ospeed --optimizeLevel 3 --target release
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release

author: hydra2s
